class.rdfs:comment: A common pathway for the electrochemical nerve impulses that are transmitted along each of the axons.
class.rdfs:label: Nerve

schema:branch.rdfs:comment: The branches that delineate from the nerve bundle. Not to be confused with [[branchOf]].
schema:branch.rdfs:label: branch

schema:nerveMotor.rdfs:comment: The neurological pathway extension that involves muscle control.
schema:nerveMotor.rdfs:label: nerveMotor

schema:sensoryUnit.rdfs:comment: The neurological pathway extension that inputs and sends information to the brain or spinal cord.
schema:sensoryUnit.rdfs:label: sensoryUnit

schema:sourcedFrom.rdfs:comment: The neurological pathway that originates the neurons.
schema:sourcedFrom.rdfs:label: sourcedFrom
